body_html:
@zhonghuabao1 : You can try using Interpreter#SetNumThreads: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/java/src/main/java/org/tensorflow/lite/Interpreter.java#L231 to change the number of threads.

Do let me know if you still need help.
